metadata.title: CVE-2024-54146 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Cacti is an open source performance and fault management framework. Cactihas a SQL injection vulnerability in the template function ofhost_templates.php using the graph_template parameter. This vulnerabilityis fixed in 1.2.29.

criterions.comment: cacti package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
